description: When I go on vacation I like to make sure I have plenty of things to keep me entertained, books, movies, games, and hot little bondage sluts to play with. This time I have Darling accompany me, and what wonderful entertainment she was! Before we get started I ask her what she knows about water and electricity. She says wisely that, the two should not be mixed. At that I stuff her pussy with an electrical stim and toss her in the pool to test that old adage. Turns out water and electricity do mix.oh yes, they mix very well! Then I take her around the grounds and we enjoy all the luxuries of vacation, swimming in the pool, warming up in the hot tub, relaxing in the steam room, basking in the sun and taking in the beautiful view. But Darling enjoys all of these while she is tied up and getting zapped with a variety of electrical toys!!!!! Mmmm vacation, theres nothing quite like it!
title: Darling
